title: Ep. 61 - The Roadhawks Are Back
description:
Pat and The Roadhawks (Ty, Evan, Nick, Connor and Zito) are back from their travels on The Road To Wrestlemania so this episode has the full PMI crew.  The boys recap Pat's unforgettable appearance on ESPN's "Get Up" with Mike Greenberg, Jalen Rose, Marcus Spears, and Isiah Thomas, and  also give a quick recap of what is now being dubbed "The Massacre at Metlife," as The Pub comes up with a couple of ways to try and raise the money for outstanding fines that Zito owes to PMI. They also chat about Digs becoming a responsible adult with the birth of Tony Landscapes, Koi ponds, drunk hillbillies, ivory poachers, and dive a little bit into who each of their picks are for the Game Of Thrones deadpool. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us. 


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
